author: mmcfalljohnsen@businessinsider.com (Morgan McFall-Johnsen), Morgan McFall-Johnsen
title: Herd immunity is the only way the coronavirus pandemic will end — and it would require a vaccine. Here's how it works.
description: Andrew Kelly/Reuters Herd immunity is likely the only way to end the coronavirus pandemic. It happens when enough of the population becomes immune to the virus, either through vaccination or infection. Pursuing herd immunity by allowing the virus to spread, r…
content:
As countries across the globe approach and pass the peaks of their first waves of coronavirus infections, officials and experts are racing to figure out how to protect people long-term.
Individuals could gain immunity to the new coronavirus if they develop a… [+9287 chars]
